title: SOLD  N172 Old Judge, Mike Dorgan, PSA 7 NM SOLD
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: SOLD  N172 Old Judge, Mike Dorgan, PSA 7 NM SOLD
posts.post_content:
SOLD

A very nice recently graded N172 Old Judge of Mike Dorgan in what apparently is an uncommon pose (no other PSA graded, but other poses have up to 14 graded).  Out of all Dorgan N172s, only one has been graded higher by PSA.  $900 delivered and insured.  Payment by PayPal F&F.

PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or ask any questions.  Thanks!
Kris
